name: Emobi
long_description:
Emobi is the leading EV charging digital infrastructure that offers a single point of legal, financial, and technical integration, empowering EV automakers and fleets with secure, reliable, and seamless charging across networks, while maximizing charger utilization. The company also enables JustPlug and Plug & Charge: secure and fully-automated charging technology.

To learn more, visit www.emobi.ai.
one_liner: A single point integration for secure and automated EV charging.
